channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3 street lights not working, 12th December
item.description:
Buccaneer avenue next the first house. Number 4 Gl34tg

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buccaneer Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cones and temporary signage - still required, 12th December
item.description:
Between Bishops Cleeve and Oxenton on the A435 there appears to be sections of cones and temporary signs that appear to no longer be serving a purpose - signs facing down into grass verge, cones separated from their bases etc. Are these still necessary - if not can these be cleared?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is misaligned (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Poor ‘repair’ a few weeks ago has been washed away and problem remains, 12th December
item.description:
Potholes both sides of the lane were reported. One was ‘fixed’ apparently by just putting a few spade loads of tarmac in the centre of the hole. This has now been washed away as the water runs through the lengthy pothole. Nothing appears to have been done to repair the other side of the lane at this point which is now breaking up more seriously.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 12th December
item.description:
NWD with give an take plus 15 minutes delay boards needed best out of hours carriageway pothole 900x500x70mm tarmac patch required please use cold lay or bucket tarmac due to traffic signal cable present best out of hours (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road breaking up and slipping, 12th December
item.description:
Dog Lane as it passes Willowbank

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Broken tree sticking out into road, 12th December
item.description:
A tree has broken/fallen on the left side as you drive up Birdlip Hill. A branch is poking out into the road. When cars are coming the other way, a large vehicle cannot avoid hitting the branch. Please can it be removed/cut back. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of potholes in Dog Lane, 12th December
item.description:
The pictures show some of the potholes in the lane outside Ivy Cottage Elmcott and Oak Cottage. Someone has put a sandbag in one of the potholes (not shown in the photos as only 3 can be posted) to try to make it safer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
